name: HSP_BKT_SPLIT_CLMS
description: This table contains information about split claims associated with liability buckets.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bucket record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SPLIT_INV_NO
columns.description: The invoice number for the split claim associated with this bucket.

columns.name: SPLIT_FORM
columns.description: The form used for the split claim associated with this bucket.

columns.name: SPLIT_CHG_TOT
columns.description: The charge total for the split claim associated with this bucket.

columns.name: SPLIT_CLP_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the claim print for the claims split that is associated with this bucket.

columns.name: SPLIT_ORIG_FORM
columns.description: The original form used for the claim associated with this bucket.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account to which the liability bucket is linked.
